r.d: A wrapper around Universally Unique IDentifier library (libuuid).
r.n: - Add support for RFC9562 UUIDs (UUID_TYPE_TIME_V6 and UUID_TYPE_TIME_V7) when available, in libuuid from util-linux version 2.41 - constant UUID_TYPE_DCE is deprecated, use UUID_TYPE_RANDOM instead - constant UUID_TYPE_NAME is deprecated, use UUID_TYPE_TIME instead - new constant UUID_TYPE_VENDOR, only for uuid_type
